com.leantegra.powermote.sdk.device.connection

Interface BaseDeviceConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PowerMoteConnection

    public interface BaseDeviceConnection
    Provides basic functionality for communication with the remote device.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    PowerMoteConnection

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  BaseDeviceConnection.ReadListener
      ReadListener provides callbacks indicating whether characteristics are read successfully or failed.
      static interface  BaseDeviceConnection.WriteListener
      WriteListener provides callbacks indicating whether characteristics are written successfully or failed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Connect to the remote device.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect an established connection, or cancel connection that is currently in progress.
      java.util.List<BluetoothGattCharacteristic> getCharacteristics()
      Returns a list of GATT characteristics from the remote device.
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns whether there is an open connection.
      void read(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, BaseDeviceConnection.ReadListener readListener)
      Reads the requested characteristic from the remote device.
      void write(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, byte[] value, BaseDeviceConnection.WriteListener writeListener)
      Write a given characteristics to the remote device.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect()
        Connect to the remote device.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnect an established connection, or cancel connection that is currently in progress.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns whether there is an open connection.
        Returns:
        True, if connection is successfully established.

      • getCharacteristics

        java.util.List<BluetoothGattCharacteristic> getCharacteristics()
        Returns a list of GATT characteristics from the remote device.
        Returns:
        List of characteristics.

      • read

        void read(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
        BaseDeviceConnection.ReadListener readListener)
        Reads the requested characteristic from the remote device.

        This is an asynchronous operation. The successful result of the read operation is returned by the onSuccess callback. If error occurred, the onError callback is triggered.

        Parameters:
        characteristic - Characteristic to read from the remote device
        readListener - The read listener
        See Also:
        BluetoothGattCharacteristic, ReadListener

      • write

        void write(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
         byte[] value,
         BaseDeviceConnection.WriteListener writeListener)
        Write a given characteristics to the remote device.

        Once the write operation has been completed successfully, the onSuccess callback is triggered, otherwise onError callback is triggered.

        Parameters:
        characteristic - Characteristic to write
        value - New characteristic value
        writeListener - The write listener
        See Also:
        BluetoothGattCharacteristic, WriteListener
